author: Marc Hedish
releaseNotes:
STABLE RELEASE — High-performance driver for APC Smart-UPS with Network Management Cards (NMC). Uses a deterministic Telnet lifecycle and transient in-memory context for sub-5-second telemetry without race conditions, stale state, or missed updates.
1.0.0.0 - Official production release. Fully hardened Telnet session flow, adaptive scheduling, and self-healing watchdog recovery. Verified multi-day uptime, reboot resilience, and synchronized refresh cycles.

Enhanced handleUPSStatus() to properly normalize multi-token NMC strings (e.g., “Online, Smart Trim”);Added nextBatteryReplacement attribute.
